content.text: I work in a store that helps people find the perfect outfit. I then head out with my dog Allie to paddle board.
That sounds like a great way to relax! I practice my guitar for hours every day, hoping to make it big in the local music scene.
That's awesome! Do you have any original songs? I love to listen to music.
Yes, I have a few original songs. I also play the flute to bring peace and tranquility to my surroundings.
That's great! I wish I could play an instrument. I'm more of a singer.
That's awesome too! What's your favorite song to sing?
I have a lot of favorite songs to sing, but one of my favorites is "Don't Stop Believin'" by Journey.
That's a great song! I love Journey!
Me too! They're one of my favorite bands.
I'm glad to meet someone else who loves Journey!
